# decode(_:)

**Instance Method**

Decodes a single value of the given type.

## Declaration

```swift
func decode(_ type: UInt32.Type) throws -> UInt32
```

## Parameters

- **type**: The type to decode as.

## Return Value

A value of the requested type.
